1.title: Am & pm yoga for beginners
1.plot: These two 30-minute programs will help you realize all the benefits of yoga by unveiling a new connection between you and your body.

2.title: Ballet Conditioning
2.plot: One of the greatest secrets to a dancer's body is ballet conditioning, which focuses on all muscle groups.

3.title: Beginner Level Yoga
3.plot: This yoga workout is designed for beginners and features two programs that are designed to increase flexibility and improve balance.

4.title: Cardio & Conditioning Yoga
4.plot: These two dynamic programs are designed to improve cardio conditioning, build strength and tone the whole body.

5.title: Hatha & Flow Yoga for Beginners Part 1
5.plot: This program makes a great group activity that you and your friends can enjoy together. Reduce stress, increase strength, tone muscle, and cultivating flexibility.

6.title: Hatha & Flow Yoga for Beginners Part 2
6.plot: These two 30-minute workout programs incorporate both Hatha and Ashtanga poses and flows in a step-by-step format appropriate for beginners.

8.title: Power Yoga
8.plot: This power yoga practice will burn calories, tone all of the major muscle groups, improve flexibility and leave you feeling revitalized, not drained like other workouts.

9.title: Slim & tone pilates
9.plot: Filmed on a beautiful location overlooking the Pacific Ocean, this dynamic workout includes both standard mat exercises and apparatus mat exercises.

10.title: Tai Chi for Beginners
10.plot: Filmed on a tranquil location overlooking the Pacific Ocean, this program features two practices and will allow you to experience the many layers of benefits this martial art offers.

11.title: Targeted Toning Yoga
11.plot: Together these three programs can help shape, strengthen and firm your body in the very positive, powerful way that only yoga can leaving you feeling relaxed, at peace and connected.

12.title: Targeted Toning Pilates for Beginners
12.plot: The Long Lean Waistline program stretches and tones your core muscles simultaneously to create firm, flat abs and sculpted waistline.

13.title: Yoga for Beginners
13.plot: This unique beginner yoga sequence will teach you yoga breathing, and take you step by step through a full range of yoga poses that will strengthen, stretch, and revitalize your body.

14.title: Yoga for Energy & Relaxation Part 1
14.plot: The Energy program revitalizes and builds stamina with postures that are known to boost the nervous system, build strength and tone muscle.

15.title: Yoga for Energy & Relaxation Part 2
15.plot: The Energy program revitalizes and builds stamina with postures that are known to boost the nervous system, build strength and tone muscle.

16.title: Yoga for Stress Relief and Flexibility
16.plot: These two rejuvenating yoga programs, filmed in a tranquil garden overlooking the Pacific Ocean, can help undo the physical and mental effects of tension.

17.title: Yoga for Weight Loss
17.plot: Filmed in a lush garden overlooking the Pacific Ocean, this dynamic yoga practice focuses on both the physical and mental factors that can affect weight.

imdb.title: Element
plot: Pilates is ideal for creating strong healthy bodies that are slim, flexible, and lean. Series is filmed on a beautiful location overlooking the Pacific Ocean.
